table.Name: wcms_Widget
table.Title: #Widget
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Widget where Widget_SiteID = @siteID { AND Widget_Name <o> @Search:Widget_Name } { AND Widget_ID <o> @Search:Widget_ID } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Widget_ID] ,[Widget_Name] ,case when [Widget_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Widget_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Widget_ID] ,[Widget_Name] ,[Widget_A] from wcms_Widget where Widget_SiteID = @siteID { AND Widget_Name <o> @Search:Widget_Name } { AND Widget_ID <o> @Search:Widget_ID } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_Widget set [Widget_A]= @active where Widget_ID = @editID select @editID
